name: Grim Seventh
description: Grim Seventh is a 3D Arcade Hack 'n' Slash game with a unique geometrical art style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics 400 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
